title: A Curse of Sparks
description: Dark ruins. Powerful creatures. Deadly artifacts. Just another year at Callador, School for the Fae.For Imogen, this year at Callador brings harder challenges, higher stakes, fewer truths, and even more lies. Her elders are urging her to choose her future path in the Fae world…but Imogen’s distracted by other things.Her mom is acting strange. Her best friend isn’t speaking to her. And just as she realizes what she wants from her love life…she learns it’s something she can never have. Imogen wants to keep her head down and focus—but her enemies have other plans.The forests surrounding Callador hold more than just exotic plants and beautiful creatures, but a terrible, unleashed sorcery. As Imogen’s list of allies shrinks, the threats that hunt her continue to grow. To prevent a deadly disaster, she’ll need to navigate ancient ruins, steal an ancient Fae artifact, and risk her own life to overcome its power.In the end, all the answers point to only one villain. But what will Imogen do if that ultimate villain turns out to be herself?
author: Sophia Shade
